tags.name: artist
tags.description: the artist name. Its meaning is not well-defined; see “composer” and “performer” for more specific tags.

tags.name: artistsort
tags.description: same as artist, but for sorting. This usually omits prefixes such as “The”.

tags.name: album
tags.description: the album name.

tags.name: albumsort
tags.description: same as album, but for sorting.

tags.name: albumartist
tags.description: on multi-artist albums, this is the artist name which shall be used for the whole album. The exact meaning of this tag is not well-defined.

tags.name: albumartistsort
tags.description: same as albumartist, but for sorting.

tags.name: title
tags.description: the song title.

tags.name: track
tags.description: the decimal track number within the album.

tags.name: name
tags.description: a name for this song. This is not the song title. The exact meaning of this tag is not well-defined. It is often used by badly configured internet radio stations with broken tags to squeeze both the artist name and the song title in one tag.

tags.name: genre
tags.description: the music genre.

tags.name: date
tags.description: the song’s release date. This is usually a 4-digit year.

tags.name: composer
tags.description: the artist who composed the song.

tags.name: performer
tags.description: the artist who performed the song.

tags.name: comment
tags.description: a human-readable comment about this song. The exact meaning of this tag is not well-defined.

tags.name: disc
tags.description: the decimal disc number in a multi-disc album.

tags.name: label
tags.description: the name of the label or publisher.

tags.name: musicbrainz_artistid
tags.description: the artist id in the MusicBrainz database.

tags.name: musicbrainz_albumid
tags.description: the album id in the MusicBrainz database.

tags.name: musicbrainz_albumartistid
tags.description: the album artist id in the MusicBrainz database.

tags.name: musicbrainz_trackid
tags.description: the track id in the MusicBrainz database.

tags.name: musicbrainz_releasetrackid
tags.description: the release track id in the MusicBrainz database.

tags.name: musicbrainz_workid
tags.description: the work id in the MusicBrainz database.
